'''Preview 26.0.43''' is an unreleased [[developer build]] of [[Bedrock Edition Preview 26.0.23]], recorded at some point before December 4, 2025,<ref name="dev-diaries">{{ytl|aZxc-av4eps|ALL ABOUT THE SPEAR|Minecraft|December 5, 2025|t=1m7s}}</ref> and shown in part of the "[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aZxc-av4eps ALL ABOUT THE SPEAR]" [[Dev Diaries]] episode on the official ''Minecraft'' YouTube channel.

== Changes ==
Differences between this version and [[Bedrock Edition Preview 26.0.23]] are unknown.
